movies.title: Harry Potter y la Piedra Filosofal
movies.description: On the day of his eleventh birthday, Harry Potter discovers that he is the son of two well-known wizards, from whom he has inherited magical powers. You will then have to go to a famous school of magic and sorcery: Howards.

movies.title: Harry Potter y la Cámara Secreta
movies.description: Summer over, Harry can't wait to leave his hateful aunt and uncle's house. Unexpectedly, Dobby, a house-elf, shows up in his bedroom, announcing that he will be in great danger if he returns to Hogwarts.

movies.title: Harry Potter y el prisionero de Azkaban
movies.description: When Harry Potter and his friends return to Hogwarts for their third year of studies, they find themselves involved in a mystery: Sirius Black, a dangerous wizard who was an accomplice of Lord Voldemort, has escaped from Azkaban prison for wizards and who will try to take revenge on Harry Potter.

movies.title: Harry Potter y el cáliz de fuego
movies.description: The fourth part of the wizard boy series begins with the International Quidditch Cup. It also tells the beginning of the attraction to Cho Chang and another year of magic, in which a great surprise will force Harry to face many fearsome challenges.

movies.title: Harry Potter y la Orden del Fénix
movies.description: The plot of The Order of the Phoenix revolves around the saga of intrigue that arouses the Ministry of Magic by taking an official position, denying the return of Lord Voldemort and, therefore, refusing to take action to prevent danger.

movies.title: Harry Potter y el misterio del príncipe
movies.description: Sixth installment of the young wizard saga, in which Harry discovers a powerful book and, while trying to discover its origins, collaborates with Dumbledore in the search for a series of magical objects that will help in the destruction of Lord Voldemort.

movies.title: Harry Potter y las reliquias de la Muerte: parte 1
movies.description: Harry, Ron and Hermione leave Hogwarts to begin their most important mission: they have to destroy the horcruxes, the secret of Voldemort's power and immortality, in which the feared dark wizard keeps the fragments of his soul.

movies.title: Harry Potter y las reliquias de la Muerte: parte 2
movies.description: A showdown between good and evil awaits as young Harry (Daniel Radcliffe), Ron (Rupert Grint) and Hermione (Emma Watson) prepare for one last stand against Lord Voldemort (Ralph Fiennes). Harry has become into a strong young man on a mission to rid the world of evil. The friends have to search for the Horcruxes that keep the wizard immortal. Harry and Voldemort meet at Hogwarts Castle for an epic fight.
